desc: Aconite Creations is a unique brand of striking, armour-like accessories blurring the lines between costume and fashion. Items include breastplates, bracers, collars, chokers, shoulder armour, circlet and a spectacular spine backpiece. Ideal for cosplay, steampunk, elves and dancers and special events.

layout.text:
Ornate. Flexible. Wearable.
Striking, armour-like accessories blurring the lines between costume and fashion, our signature is dramatic ornate pieces that are lightweight, comfortable and eminently wearable.
